summary: The FTC lost a roughly three-year-long attempt to undo Microsoft's $69 billion acquisition of gaming giant Activision Blizzard . A three-judge panel for the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals made it clear that regulators need to show evidence, not solely a theory, that a tie-up will cause real harm to competition .  The unanimous decision pushes back on a wide antitrust enforcement net cast by the Trump and Biden administrations to rein in Big Tech . The government has been successful in arguing that Google illegally monopolized the general search engine market .  The FTC re-upped a challenge to the merger in a lawsuit filed in the agency's in-house court . The appellate court denied its request for an injunction to pause the merger . The FTC had alleged that combining the two companies would hurt competition in three gaming markets .  Microsoft agreed to allow "Call of Duty" on Sony’s PlayStation for 10 years . Under pressure from US regulators and antitrust enforcers in the UK, Microsoft agreed .

At least one Apple executive expects AI-powered alternatives to Google's search engine will eventually be offered to users of Apple's web browser . Shares of parent company Alphabet fell 8% on Wednesday after this possibility was revealed . Interested investors worried about Apple's growing interest in AI competition might want to use this setback as an opportunity to buy Alphabet stock .  Apple's services chief Eddy Cue commented on Wednesday that he believes artificial intelligence-powered web search tools like OpenAI or Perplexity will eventually be added to the list of search engines made available to users of Apple's proprietary web browser, Safari . No likely time frames were given, nor were any guarantees made .  Apple is considering introducing alternative search tools or removing Google as Safari's default search engine . Google currently handles 90% of the world's web queries, according to StatCounter . According to online advertising research outfit Chitika, 97% of iPhone users use Google's search engine on their phones .  Google's Gmail alone boasts over 2.5 billion worldwide users . TV ratings outfitNielsens says Google's YouTube is the U.S. single-most-visited streaming video platform .  Safari users' usage of Google's AI-powered search engine is limited . It's going to take a long time to sever Safari users from using Google's other services . The prospect isn't nearly as catastrophic as some are fearing it may be, though .  Alphabet's search business might be dented by the advent of other AI-powered search options . It won't be major or permanent damage, though. If you liked Alphabet before Wednesday, there's still just as much to like now .  The Motley Fool’s total average return is 907% — a market-crushing outperformance compared to163% for the S&P 500 .
